body_html:
So I have cuda 8.0 RC (cudnn 5.0 (5005)) working with my gtx 1060 , keras 1.0.6 and theano 0.9.0 dev2.
I am still curious to know the state of support for cuDNN 5.1, if it works with theano yet? 0.8.2 or 0.9.0 dev2. If not, soon?
